bio:
Erikur, a Nord man, resides in Solitude. His house is near the Blue Palace, where Erikur serves as an important member of the court. He serves as Thane to Elisif the Fair, the Jarl of Solitude. Melaran, an Altmer mage who specializes in Alteration magic, serves as Erikur's housecarl.
He is typically found in the Blue Palace or his house, located in the city. He has a stake in almost anything important in Solitude.
During Thalmor Ambassador Elenwen's party at the Thalmor Embassy (west of Solitude), Erikur expresses affection for the Bosmer waitress Brelas, and stares at her throughout the party. Erikur may ask the player to have Brelas meet with Erikur at his quarters later, and will be willing to provide a distraction at the party if requested.
Gisli is Erikur's resentful sister, who lives with him at their house. She runs errands for him and frequently insults him because of his rude personality.
Erikur has a rivalry with Thane Bryling.
Erikur is the client for a Thieves Guild mission. After being cheated by the captain of the Dainty Sload (a pirate ship), Erikur contracts the Thieves Guild to frame the captain for possession of the illegal drug Balmora Blue.
name: Erikur
